title: Post-it Super Sticky Easel Pad, Great for Virtual Teachers and Students, 25 x 30 Inches, 30 Sheets/Pad, 2 Pads, Lined Premium Self Stick Flip Chart Paper, Teacher Anchor Chart (561WL) (561WL VAD 2PK)
description: Simplify note-taking at your next meeting with these Post-it Super Sticky Easel Pads that offer faint lines to help keep your writing straight. Adhesive-backed sheets stick to most wall surfaces, and the paper resists bleed-through. Lined, 30-sheet pad, 25 x 30 inches.
